Strings.Text: {scroll 0}\nWesker.{scroll 1}{timed 40}
{scroll 0}\nYou did a fine job, Barry.{scroll 1}{timed 50}
{scroll 0}\nJust as I thought.{scroll 1}{timed 70}

{scroll 0}I think you should stay away
from Barry, Jill.{scroll 1}{clear 75}{scroll 0}I hear that his wife and two
daughters will be in danger{scroll 1}{clear 80}{scroll 0}if he doesn't do everything
I tell him to.{scroll 1}{timed 72}
{scroll 0}\nYou are so cruel!{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}Well, you don't have to\nworry about anything,{scroll 1}{clear 60}{scroll 0}because you'll be free from\nthis world very soon, Jill.{scroll 1}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}Why do you have to destroy\nＳＴＡＲＳ?{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}\nAhh, that's why having{scroll 1}{clear 56}{scroll 0}ＳＴＡＲＳ nosing about is\nso inconvenient.{scroll 1}{timed 114}
{scroll 0}So you're a slave of\nUmbrella now?{scroll 1}{clear 60}{scroll 0}Along with these virus\nmonsters.{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}Barry, go up on the ground\nand wait there.{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}\nBarry!{scroll 1}{timed 35}
{scroll 0}\nBarry's such a fool.{scroll 1}{clear 40}{scroll 0}He'll be under the control\nof Umbrella forever.{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}How come both Umbrella and\nyou can intimidate him{scroll 1}{clear 90}{scroll 0}by taking his family\nas hostages?{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}So you're planning\nsomething else?{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nYou must stop this now!{scroll 1}{timed 70}
{scroll 0}So you're going to\nsteal all the research?{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}Better yet! I'm going to\nshow you the Tyrant!{scroll 1}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}\nBarry!{scroll 1}{timed 35}
{scroll 0}\nSorry, Jill.{scroll 1}{timed 50}
{scroll 0}So it's all been masterminded\nby him!{scroll 1}{timed 130}
{scroll 0}But it's good that you\nknow that now.{scroll 1}{clear 76}{scroll 0}Anyway, let's get out of\nthis house first.{scroll 1}{timed 100}
{scroll 0}\nJill!{scroll 1}{timed 26}
{scroll 0}Do you think we could see,\nTyrant, now?{scroll 1}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}Barry, \nyou're so optimistic.{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nIt would look bad for ＳＴＡＲＳ{scroll 1}{clear 60}{scroll 0}if we let such a dangerous\ncreature run loose.{scroll 1}{timed 100}
{scroll 0}Maybe you're right!\nLet's go then!{scroll 1}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nBarry is no longer useful.{scroll 1}{timed 65}
{scroll 0}Just as I thought! You are\nthe man behind all of this!{scroll 1}{timed 130}
{scroll 0}\nWhat happened to Wesker?{scroll 1}{timed 60}

{scroll 0}The triggering system has
now been activated.{scroll 1}{clear 90}{scroll 0}All researchers and
guards should take cover{scroll 1}{clear 70}{scroll 0}immediately. Unlock all
routes for evacuation.{scroll 1}{timed 60}
{scroll 0}\nWesker must have set it off.{scroll 1}{clear 62}{scroll 0}There's not much time left\nfor us.{scroll 1}{timed 88}
{scroll 0}\nWhat happened to Wesker?{scroll 1}{timed 40}
